item.title: eskild.art
item.description: eskild.art is now live! I have plenty of ideas on what this might morph into but for now, it’s simply a gallery. Can you solve the riddle to view the image?
item.content:encoded:
eskild.art is now live!

I have plenty of ideas on what this might morph into but for now, it’s simply a gallery. Can you solve the riddle to view the image?
